full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SENG GDONG DRAG BSGRUB BSRUNG BZLOG GI RGYUN KHYER DPA' MO'I NAD RGYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , SENG GDONG BDUD 'DUL DRAG MO'I LAS BYANG GYI KHA BSKONG RNAMS BZHUGS, ,
